name: Molgenis
description: For biologists MOLGENIS is a suite of web databases for genotype, phenotype, QTL and analysis pipelines. / For bioinformaticians MOLGENIS is software generator to rapidly build web databases that make your biologists happy.
instance_information: MOLGENIS helps to find, capture, exchange, manage and analyse scientific data. It is fully customizable: data structure, user interface and layout can be fully changed and you can plug-in your own (bioinformatics) scripts to make your MOLGENIS very special.
